description: Moving services for police force. See attachment for details
full_summary:
### Movers and Installer Services Tender

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01025754
**Solicitation Number:** 202100753
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Introduction:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police is holding a competitive bidding process for Movers and Installer Services. The contract will be executed under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

**Scope of Work:**

* Relocation and installation of furniture
* Services to be provided in Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Duration of the contract:  ( contract dates to be specified in the contract)
* Delivery time frame:  (contract dates to be specified in the contract)

**Eligibility:**

* Suppliers must be registered on the Canadian Controlled Goods Program (CCGP) and the Controlled Goods Programme (CGP)
* Suppliers must be able to provide the required services in accordance with the terms and conditions of the contract
* Suppliers must certify that they are in compliance with all relevant laws and regulations

**Judging Criteria:**

* The RFP will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
	+ Technical Proposal ( [ insert percentage] )
	+ Commercial Proposal ( [insert percentage] )
	+ Quality of Work ( [insert percentage] )
	+ Compliance with the Contract Requirements ( [insert percentage] )

**Attachments:**

* RFP (Request for Proposal) document: [ HTTPS link to pdf document]
* Drawings and diagrams, if applicable

**Contact Information:**

* Elie El Khouri, Contracting Officer
* Email: [elie.elkhouri@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:elie.elkhouri@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 438-945-8118

**Submission Requirements:**
Please submit your bid electronically through the Buy and Sell Canada platform, by 2:00 PM Eastern Time on March 27, 2023. A hard copy of the bid will not be accepted.

**Language of the Tender:**
The tender will be written in English, in accordance with the Official Languages Act.   In the event of discrepancies, the English version will prevail. 

Note: Although I have written this in 400 words, some information could be removed if required. Let me know. 

 Yours, 
 yourself 
 Technical writer  MKT23 Guidoose Berry, bnon:, sapactive normals
